question: Which of the following initial presidents of Indian National Congress also served as Sheriff of Calcutta?
explanation: George Yule was a Scottish merchant who served as the fourth President of the Congress and the first non-Indian to hold that office.He was founder of George Yule & Co. of London and headed Andrew Yule & Co. of Calcutta. He served as Sheriff of Calcutta and as President of the Indian Chamber of Commerce also.
